text:
BaubleBar (New York, NY) http://www.baublebar.com

We're a small team of engineers building an awesome ecommerce platform for a ridiculously fast growing, VC-backed startup. Your work will be used by millions of users. If any of this gets you excited, we should talk.

We're looking for really great Full-Stack PHP engineers that like to get shit done.

More info http://www.baublebar.com/careers

Feel free to email me directly: tyler@baublebar.com
